newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Island & Peninsular plans bonus issue.
newsitem.headline: Island & Peninsular plans bonus issue.

text.p: Malaysian property and plantation group Island & Peninsular Bhd has proposed a one-for-one bonus issue of up to 122.24 million shares, to be capitalised from the company's reserves.

A statement from Amanah Merchant Bank Bhd on Wednesday said Island & Peninsular also plans to increase its authorised share capital to 300 million ringgit from the existing 200 million to facilitate implementation of the bonus issue.
The proposed bonus issue is to increase Island & Peninsular's paid-up capital to a level which would better reflect the company's scale of operations, the statement said.
